title: note.
content:
//You find a folded piece of paper wedged on the bottom of the drawer.//

//It's folded wonkily, not a single one of the edges line up.//

> Read it?

[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:dots-junk-drawer-of-art |No.]]]                   

 [[collapsible show="Yes.
" hide="Fold the note back up."]]

> Yo, rando behind the screen. I'm the artist, dots. 
> 
> here's some music recommendations to pass the time.
> 
> * Chelsea Dagger/The Fratellis
> * 20190724/Mac DeMarco
> * The Great Gig in the Sky/Pink Floyd
> * Free Bird/Lynyrd Skynyrd
> * Crystal Dolphin/Engelwood
> * Bee/GroovyDominoes52
> 
> Thanks for checking this drawer out. 
> 
> [[image ARGH]]
> (click on it for better quality.)
> 
> you can have an artist-sona for your troubles.
> 
> - dots.

//Thanks for looking through this drawer. Drop a message here anytime. (and I do mean *anytime*, I'm lonely.)//

[[/collapsible]]
author: DrDots
